nodes.text: Malaphar, also known as Malaphar the Savage, was a massive male Massassi warrior who lived on the moon Yavin 4 during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the mad Jedi Revan's efforts to resurrect the Sith Emperor using the Temple of Sacrifice on Yavin 4, Malaphar and many of his warriors inhabited the structures around the temple, and they fought and were slain by Imperial and Republic forces that stormed the temple in an effort to stop Revan.
Malaphar appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the first boss in the "Temple of Sacrifice" Operation.
